casebody.data:
SOLID WASTE SERVICES, INC. d/b/a J.P. Mascaro & Sons and M.B. Investments and Jose Mendoza, Petitioners
v.
CITY OF ALLENTOWN and Waste Management of Pennsylvania, Inc., Respondents No. 568 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 22, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
